title: 2 Storey House with Land, Nawinna, Maharagama
details:
Conveniently located near to the High-Level Road, Nawinna Arpico, Nawinna Railway Station, Ayurveda Hospital and other amenities

12.4 perches land with 2 storey house
4 Large-sized Bedrooms
2 Bathrooms (1 with Hot water shower installed)
Kitchen, Dining & Living Areas
Garden Space around the house
Parking Space for 2 or 3 Vehicles
Walled Borders with Roller Gate
Clear Deeds
